00001 /* 
00002 * File: BOPhase.h
00003 * ---------------
00004 * Header file for physical phase (black oil) 
00005 * ------------------------------------------
00006 *               Created   03/10/99    Hui Cao
00007 *
00008 * 1) loop up table, get formation volume factor, phase density,
00009 * 2) calculate phase viscosity, 
00010 * 3) calculate component mole fractions
00011 * 
00012 */
00013 #ifndef BOPHASE_H_
00014 #define BOPHASE_H_
00015 #include "Phase.h"
00016 #include "ThermalPhase.h"
00017 #include "../utl/FileIO.h" 
00018 
00019 class BOPhase : public Phase {
00020 public:
00021         BOPhase(FileIO &fio, PhaseType type, int mThermal);
00022   BOPhase(BOPhase* src, PhaseType type);
00023         BOPhase(PhaseType type);
00024 
00025         virtual ~BOPhase();
00026         
00027         // --- getters -----
00028         double getStdDen() { return std_den; }                                                                          // phase density at S.C.
00029         void setAssoStdDen(double den) { asso_std_den = den; }          // disolved phase den at S.C.
00030         
00031         // --- calculate phase density, solubility, viscosity and component mole fraction ---
00032         void calcDensViscXcpp(double pres, double *mRcp, double *den, double *dden_dp,
00033                 double *vis, double *dvis_dp, double *xpp, double *dxpp_dp,
00034                 double *xcp, double *dxcp_dp);  
00035 
00036         void calcXcp_T(double pres, double temp, double *mRcp, 
00037                 double *xpp, double *dxpp_dT, double *xcp, double *dxcp_dT);
00038 
00039         double getFVF(double pres);
00040         double getDens(double pres);
00041         double getVis(double pres);
00042         // --- calculate component mole fraction ---
00043         void calcXcpp(double *xpp, double *dxpp_dp, double *xcp, double *dxcp_dp);
00044 
00045         void calcXcpT(double *xpp, double *dxpp_dT, double *xcp, double *dxcp_dT);
00046 
00047         void calcFVF(double pres, double &b, double &db_dp); 
00048         void calcDens(double pres, double &den, double &dden_dp);
00049         void calcVis(double pres, double &vis, double &dvis_dp);
00050 
00051         void calcRS(double pres, double &RS, double &dRS_dp);
00052         void calcRS(double pres, double &RS);   
00053 
00054         ThermalPhase *thermal;
00055         
00056 private:
00057         double std_den, asso_std_den;           // phase densities at S.C.
00058         double compr_b, compr_v;                        // compressibility for density and viscosity
00059         double bp;                                                      // bouble point pressure
00060         
00061         int length;                                                     // table(pT, bT, viscT, rcpT) length
00062         double *pT, *bT, *visT, *rcpT;          // table
00063         
00064         double b, db_dp;                                        // formation volume factor and its derivative
00065         double rcp, drcp_dp;                            // solubility and its derivative 
00066 
00067         double db_dT, drcp_dT;
00068         
00069         // --- calculate density and its derivative ---
00070         void calcDens(double *den, double *dden_dp);
00071         
00072         // --- initialize variables -------
00073         void initVars();
